definition: potency/titer (measure of effective concentration in virology or chemical pathology, defined in terms of potency after dilution by titration)/valence (perceived value in psychology)/valency
potency/titer (measure of effective concentration in virology or chemical pathology, defined in terms of potency after dilution by titration)

sentences.english: The immunity serum titer was mensurated by the routine ELISA.
sentences.chinese: 常规ELISA法测定免疫血清效价。

sentences.english: If you are a husband you have to do other ABO blood type antibody titer.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是O你老公是其他血型还要做ABO抗体效价。

sentences.english: Methods The titer and affinity of anti-A secreted by hybridoma were tested by tube method and slide method.
sentences.chinese: 通过试管法和玻片法检测抗A抗体的效价和亲和力。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To develop a diffusion method to determine the meleumycin tablets.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立麦白霉素片效价的微生物比浊法。

sentences.english: Valence considers both the goals and needs of the individual.
sentences.chinese: 效价主要关心的是个人的目标与需要。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish a turbidimetric method for the content determination of meleumycin preparations.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立比浊法测定麦白霉素制剂效价的方法。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To develop a method to determine the potency of Acetylspiramycin tablets.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立测定乙酰螺旋霉素片效价的方法。

sentences.english: Objective To verify the feasibility of a method for determining the titer of fosfomycin sodium by turbidimetry.
sentences.chinese: 目的验证比浊法测定磷霉素钠效价方法的可行性。

sentences.english: Serum titers were tested by mouse neutralization test.
sentences.chinese: 采用小鼠中和试验测定血清效价。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To develop a turbidimetric method to determine Kanamycin sulfate injection.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立测定硫酸卡那霉素效价的方法。

sentences.english: The serum of the immunized ducklings were collected and the antibody titer were measured by neutralizing test.
sentences.chinese: 同时对免疫的雏鸭采血，中和试验测定血清的效价。

sentences.english: Experiment showed that the higher the glycerol tolerant, the higher clavulanic titre is.
sentences.chinese: 试验表明，甘油耐受量高的菌株克拉维酸效价也高。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a turbidimetric method for the contents determination of minocycline hydrochloride capsule.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立浊度法测定盐酸米诺环素胶囊的效价。
